title: The good, the bad and the animated
brief_description: A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival. This animated homage to Sergio Leone has the classic western ‘shootout’, between a cowboy in black and a cowboy in white. This town ain’t big enough for the both of them.
